question.title: Add constraints to additionalProperties in openapi
question.body:
I'm trying to add a maxLength constraint to the 'value' part of a Map<String, String> that I generate from the following yaml:

MyMap:
  type: object
  additionalProperties:
    type: string

I would have expected to be able to do something like this:

MyMap:
  type: object
  additionalProperties:
    type: string
    maxLength: 30

And have it generate the following code:

Map<String, @Size(max = 30)String>

However it does not add the '@Size()' to the generated java model. Is it possible to add this type of length constraint to the value part of the Map in some way?

I am already using this in an array where it works perfectly:

read:
  type: array
  items:
    type: string
    maxLength: 30

This generates the javacode:

read(List<@Size(max = 30)String> read)
